t: CVC Capital Partners IPO: Everything you need to know about CVC Capital
s: November 1, 2023 - The origin of CVC Capital Partners was founded in 1981 as Citicorp Venture Capital, a subsidiary of Citigroup. In 1993 managing director Michael Smith and several senior investment officials spun out from Citibank to form CVC Capital as an independent private equity firm.

Amazon.com, Inc., referred to as “Amazon.com,” was incorporated in 1994 in the state of Washington and reincorporated in 1996 in the state of Delaware. Its principal corporate offices are located in Seattle, Washington.
